reviews.text: One of the best restaurants I have ever been to! The food was amazing and the interior is beautiful. Creates a very nice atmosphere. The food was delicious. I would 10000% recommend this restaurant when visiting Vilnius. Even the prices were really good. The staff was really kind and funny.

Great location down a quiet road just off the main tourist area so it was quiet and easy to get a table for a large group.
Prices are reasonable and there's a good selection of traditional Lithuanian food. Service was a little slow but otherwise fine.
Food was reasonable but not the best I've had in Vilnius. Reasonable drinks prices and selection.

Hidden, very nice restaurant. The staff is extremely professional, but don't expect a smile. I like the staff to be smiling, to be pleasant. You'll feel like you're being served by robots here. Maximum professional, but not a bit of smile, nothing like that.
We waited 45 minutes for our food, which I thought was very long.
Anyway, the environment is amazing. It's beautiful in the garden and inside. The food and the wine were excellent.
I take a star off for the long wait and no smile.
I would still recommend the restaurant. Worth a visit.

The staff is friendly and patient, potatoes here are especially good(important for a cuisine that has a pretty big focus on potatoes), and the garlic bread is traditionally excellent. The dessert is airy and sweet.

Everything had a nice presentation, and the feel of the restaurant is atmospheric.

The food is simply amazing. Best Lithuanian food I've tried so far. Also, prices are very fair.
The Gabi dessert was really tasty and unique.
